thread.section_title: DriveAway Holidays Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveAway Holidays Australia | driveaway.com.au
thread.title: TINO
thread.title_full: DriveAway Holidays Australia reviewed by TINO

author: TINO
title: TINO
text: We have used DriveAway Holidays three times now, twice for Leasing in Europe and once within Australia. Availability of contacting is great, they are competitively price, and the two leases we have had both went smoothly, no problems whatsoever. Last year as it was short notice, we even got given an upgraded car for the same price and they acted very quickly with hardly any notice. We have yet to complete the Australian rental car. Would highly recommend DriveAway Holidays Australia.
